issue.title: VisualPlugins not registering SDF elements (Gazebo2, Indigo) -> (Gazebo7, Kinetic)

content.raw:
@chapulina I revisited this issue today and installed gazebo/sdformat from source. When installed from source, this issue does not exist (at the current head of the sdf4 and gazebo7 branches).

I then switched to the latest binary releases for gazebo7/sdformat-sdf/sdformat4-dev from the osrfoundation debian repos, was able to upgrade all packages alongside ros-kinetic, and the issue was resolved. I'm closing the ticket here.
content.html:
@chapulina I revisited this issue today and installed gazebo/sdformat from source. When installed from source, this issue does not exist (at the current head of the sdf4 and gazebo7 branches).

I then switched to the latest binary releases for gazebo7/sdformat-sdf/sdformat4-dev from the osrfoundation debian repos, was able to upgrade all packages alongside ros-kinetic, and the issue was resolved. I'm closing the ticket here.
